line_1: Ere I was hurri'd off the dangerous brink,
line_2: Oh blest occasion made me stay to think,

line_1: Carelessly nods and sleeps upon the brink,
line_2: While others poison what the flock must drink;

line_1: Or, richly brown, ream owre the brink,
line_2: O thou, my MUSE! guid, auld SCOTCH DRINK!

line_1: Or, richly brown, ream owre the brink,
line_2: Whether thro' wimplin worms thou jink,

line_1: Or, richly brown, ream owre the brink,
line_2: Inspire me, till I lisp an' wink,

line_1: Alas! I touch the dreadful brink,
line_2: From nature's verge impell'd I sink,

line_1: Twice his dear country was on ruin's brink,
line_2: Resolv'd to save her, or with her to sink,

line_1: Sudden beneath Toddida's whistling brink,
line_2: The circling billows in wild eddies sink,

line_1: Lo there, diffus'd along the sacred brink,
line_2: Conceive their God, and from his presence drink

line_1: Tho' constantly on poortith's brink,
line_2: They're no sae wretched 's ane wad think;

line_1: GOddess of ease, leave Lethe's brink,
line_2: For once endure the pain to think,

line_1: Then shall They find, that, e'en on danger's brink,
line_2: He dares to Speak, what they scarce dare to Think.

line_1: That will show your fair face as you stand on the brink,
line_2: And murmurs most sweetly all under the Link.

line_1: Fill'd a large Jug up to the Brink;
line_2: Then stept aside to fetch 'em Drink,

line_1: Just as she rose and reach'd the brink,
line_2: To make the rock all slowly sink

line_1: Beside some water's rushy brink
line_2: With me the Muse shall sit, and think

line_1: The tankard stood, replenish'd to the brink
line_2: With the cool beverage blue-ey'd Naiads drink.

line_1: As on a Promontory's brink:
line_2: Whose strut majestic made him shrink,

line_1: I hover'd on creation's brink,
line_2: He died — nor had I time to think

line_1: Beside some water's rushy brink
line_2: With me the Muse shall sit and think

line_1: Kneel with parch'd lip, and bending from it's brink
line_2: From dripping palm the scanty river drink;

line_1: Stretch their fair necks, and leaning o'er the brink
line_2: View the pale regions of the dead, and shrink;

line_1: Float in bright squadrons by the willowy brink,
line_2: Or circling slow in limpid eddies sink;

line_1: Dip their long tresses from the mossy brink,
line_2: With tufted roots the glassy currents drink;

line_1: To Mis'ry's brink,
line_2: He, ruin'd, sink!

line_1: And Moonlight sleeps upon its hoary brink.
line_2: On the pale stream expiring Zephyrs sink,

line_1: Two Sister-Nymphs to Ganges' flowery brink
line_2: Bend their light steps, the lucid water drink,

line_1: — As the pale squadrons, bending o'er the brink,
line_2: View with a sigh their alter'd forms, and drink;

line_1: And wider rings successive dash the brink. —
line_2: Closed round their heads reluctant eddies sink,

line_1: For nineteen chicks his dame did brink,
line_2: Fifteen he meant to serve their King;

line_1: Narrow and sharp th' ascent; each edge a brink,
line_2: Whence to vast depth dire precipices sink.

line_1: And out of danger, e'en on danger's brink;
line_2: Taught by State-Quacks himself secure to think,

line_1: Thus trembling on an awful brink?
line_2: MY soul! and dost thou faintly shrink,

line_1: While ignorance led them to that whirlpool's brink,
line_2: Where long they struggled, and where now they sink!
